body:
Heey resepignev here,
some of you might know the old map "Ravaged".
And some of you really liked it and want it back. We all know that this isn't going to happen ever.

Now to my concern. If you have any screenshots of that map, videos or whatever you can find to this map, please post it here. Maybe someone knows where it got originally submitted to. 

Well, I want to try to re-create it. I don't want to copy it 1 to 1, but I need some pictures as pattern.

PS. I did some researching, but I couldn't find pictures except a video.

Thank you for helping <3
And also Congrats Evo/UmbreonMessiah on getting Moderator again.
body_tagged:

Now to my concern. If you have any screenshots of that map, videos or whatever you can find to this map, please post it here. Maybe someone knows where it got originally submitted to. 

Well, I want to try to re-create it. I don't want to copy it 1 to 1, but I need some pictures as pattern.

PS. I did some researching, but I couldn't find pictures except a video.

Thank you for helping <3
And also Congrats Evo/UmbreonMessiah on getting Moderator again.

replies.body:
I don't understand.
Once when I wanted one of my maps removed, para said that when you submit a map to Avicus, they have all the rights to do everything they want with it, and I completely agree with this rule. So why did you remove ravaged? I guess so even if the creator wanted this removed, he shouldn't be able to do that like happened to me, because this rule applies to everyone.
